name: Shrimp and Zucchini Rice Bowl
author: Uncle Ben's
summary: Silky-soft green onions enliven whole-grain rice that serves as the base of a satisfying bowl of garlicky sauteed shrimp and zucchini with herbed lemon-Dijon sauce.
ingredients: 2 (8.8 ounce) packages UNCLE BEN'S® READY RICE® Whole Grain Brown Rice
1 pound peeled and deveined large shrimp
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat
Add green onions and 1/8 teaspoon salt
Cover and cook until green onions are tender, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes; add a tablespoon of water during cooking if green onions start to brown
Add rice to skillet; cook over medium heat 2 minutes or until thoroughly heated, stirring occasionally
Divide rice mixture evenly among 4 bowls
Increase heat to medium-high and add remaining 1 tablespoon oil to skillet
Add zucchini and remaining 1/8 teaspoon salt; saute 3 minutes or until zucchini starts to soften
Add garlic and shrimp; cook 4 minutes or until shrimp are done
Add chicken stock, lemon juice, and mustard to skillet, scraping pan to loosen browned bits; cook 3 minutes or until sauce slightly thickens
Remove from heat, and stir in butter and tarragon
Garnish with additional tarragon, if desired
